description: This code performs an optimization over the structure of a porous electrode formed from a lattice of unit cells. This is a steepest descent version of the code used in: V. A. Beck, J. J. Wong, C. F. Jekel, D. A. Tortorelli, S. E. Baker, E. B. Duoss and M. A. Worsley, Computational design of microarchitected porous electrodes for redox flow batteries, J. Power Sources, 2021, 512, 230453.
name: Lattice Optimization for Porous Electrode
